name: GraBcubEs
description:
Designed to be used with Leap (mounted), Oculus DK2 and 3D connexion mouse for movement.

Leap is needed to grab cubes, pinch action near stack of cubes to grab.

Place (or drop/nudge) 3 of them in the appropriate areas, to win) 

Average Hits before win is 23! 

"It's like scuba diving"

"Go real high and drop bomb them"

"Eugh, getting really queasy"

"VERY Trippy!"
